entities.name: amulets
entities.description: The text mentions amulets as effective against werewolves, dementors, and inferi. The amulet seller is also mentioned, rattling armfuls of silver symbols on chains at passers-by.

entities.name: werewolves
entities.description: The text mentions werewolves as one of the things that amulets are effective against.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The text mentions dementors as one of the things that amulets are effective against.

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: The text mentions inferi as one of the things that amulets are effective against.

entities.name: madam malkin's
entities.description: The text mentions Madam Malkin's as a place where they need to go for new dress robes and school robes.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: The text mentions Hermione wanting new dress robes from Madam Malkin's.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: The text mentions Ron showing too much ankle in his school robes and needing new ones from Madam Malkin's.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The text mentions Harry growing so much and needing new school robes from Madam Malkin's.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: The text mentions Mrs Weasley being nervous and consulting a list, as well as talking to the amulet seller.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: The text mentions Mr Weasley glaring angrily at the amulet seller.
